item.title: Tjs HD GPS v1.54.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 14, 2025

Tjs HD GPS v1.54.1 ATS

Changelogs v1.54.1
– added support for international 9400i
– Added support Kenworth C500 by Team Edition
– Added support for Kishadowalker’s Mack superliner
– Added support for Mercedes Aroc Agrar
– added Cory Watsons Mack Cruiseliner
– added support for GMC (no exterior rendering)
– IMPORTANT* ( I have disabled exterior rendering for mac anthem trucks)
– added support for T800 Wrecker
– Added support for Ram 3500, F-450 (support is limited due to not being able to test these 2 trucks)
– Added support for -> ziggy dans 589

Description:
GPS now includes game time
ETA Timer which shows in (HH:MM) how long it will take you to arrive at your destination
GPS is now independent from the game original GPS, meaning trucks dashboard GPS are no longer affected by this mod.

Mod Priority
This mod is categorised as a Tunning Parts, so place it along other tunning parts mod you may have. It should have a higher priority than any map mods, meaning it should be placed above map mods on the mod list.

Supported Trucks Brand (As Center Windshield Sets & AC, Toyhang and Driver Side Windshield Sets Accessories)
– Fred Cascadia
– Freightliner Cascadia 2019, Coronado, FLB, FLD, Cascadia 2024
– F3D Carhauler
– GMC
– Internat 9800
– International 9900i, Lonestar, LT, HX520 2022, 9400i
– Kenworth K100e, T610, T680, 2022 T680, T800, W900, W990, Mammoth, T800 Wrecker, C500 by Team Edition
– Mack Anthem, Chu 613, Anthem 2018, Mack Pinnacle, Cory Watsons Mack Cruiseliner, Kishadowalker’s Mack superliner
– Mercedes Aroc Agrar
– Peterbilt 389, 567, 579, 2004-2006 Peterbilt 379X(Mod), (ziggy dans 589)
– SCOT A 2HD
– Volvo VNL, VNL 780, VNL 2018, VNL FR 2024
– Weternstar 49x, 57x, 5700xe, White Western Star
– Rezbilt 389

Credits: The Jetz Stream

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: GMC White Cabover v1.5 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 14, 2025

GMC White Cabover v1.5 1.54 ATS

Features:
2 Cabins, “short cabin and long cabin”
4 chassis “4×2/6×4”
Tank supports
Interchangeable side lights.
8 types of bumpers.
Chassis, “black, alum, red, paintable
24 types of exhaust, “12 singles, 12 doubles
7 types of front fenders
7 types of rear fenders
Intake filter, “chrome, plastic, paintable”
2 types of rear air filters
3 Grills
3 air horns
4 ront logs
gps cabin
Door accessories emblems
Mirrors “single, double”
Fenders, “4×2/6×4”
3 rear bumpers
11 interior leather colors
11 interior bed colors
11 seats leather colors
11 wood colors for board
steering wheel dlc compatibility
10 sunshield
7 types of trailer hitch cables
5 types of upper spoiler, “chrome, printable”
2 tanks, “chrome, alum, paintable”
Rear bumper lights, “interchangeable with slots”

Compatibility: 1.54

Credits: Station95

item.title: Scania V8 Stock sound v11.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 14, 2025

Scania V8 Stock sound v11.0 ETS2

Version 11.0 Changelog:
– Added DSC14 engine for 4 Series
– Reworked all samples
– Engines are now labled as “stock”, except NG which only replaces the sound and not engine file due to compatibility issue with Eugene’s Scania
– 4-6 Series DC16 sound now also has directional sound like NG DC16,
so the engine will sounds different depends on where you are related to the engine.
– Euro 6 and Euro 5 EEV engines in 6 Series will TEMPORARILY uses NG sound
– Readjusted gearbox whine pitch
– Various adjustments

Credits: SlavJerry

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Bob Bitruck Mateus Wesley v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 14, 2025

Bob Bitruck Mateus Wesley v1.0 ETS2

Okay, “Bob Bitruck Mateus Wesley ETS2” points to a very specific and popular type of truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), heavily associated with the Brazilian trucking scene in the game.

Let’s break it down:
Bob: This is a common and affectionate nickname in the Brazilian ETS2 community for a rigid truck (not a tractor unit that pulls a semi-trailer). These are trucks with a fixed cargo body (like a box, flatbed, dump truck, etc.).
Bitruck: As we’ve discussed, this refers to a truck with two tandem axles at the rear (a 6×2 or 8×2 configuration), which allows for greater load capacity and is very common in Brazil.
Mateus Wesley: This is the key identifier here. Mateus Wesley is a well-known and respected modder in the Brazilian ETS2 community. He’s famous for creating high-quality, detailed, and often customizable truck and bus mods, particularly those reflecting the unique style and accessories popular among Brazilian truckers. His mods are highly sought after.

Credits: WESLWY

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: NOVA P310 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 14, 2025

NOVA P310 v1.0 ETS2

You’re hitting on a very specific and iconic truck within the Brazilian ETS2 modding community!
“P310 Sabãozinho ETS2” refers to a highly popular and customized mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 that brings a specific real-world truck with a famous nickname into the game.

Let’s break it down:
Scania P310: This is a real-world, semi-heavy duty truck model from Scania. The “P” series typically refers to Scania’s distribution and regional haulage trucks, often with a shorter, more compact cab compared to the R or S series. The “310” indicates its engine power (310 hp). The P310 is very common in Brazil for various applications, including rigid trucks (like “Bitrucks” or “Tocos”) and lighter tractor units.
“Sabãozinho” (Little Soap): This is the nickname given to a specific, very famous, and highly customized Scania P310 truck in Brazil. This particular truck gained significant popularity among truckers and truck enthusiasts for its unique modifications, often including:
Extremely Low Suspension (Arqueado/Rebaixado): The “Sabãozinho” is known for having its front and sometimes rear suspension significantly lowered, giving it a distinctive “slammed” or “arched” look. This is a very common customization style in Brazil.
Distinctive Paint Job and Accessories: It often features specific paint schemes, unique lighting setups, custom bumpers, wheels, and other accessories that make it instantly recognizable.
Associated with GBN: The “Sabãozinho” is strongly associated with GBN (Grupo Bombasticos de Night), a very famous group/community of Brazilian truckers known for their highly customized trucks and a unique lifestyle. Many Scania P310 “Sabãozinho” mods aim to replicate the GBN version.

ETS2 (Euro Truck Simulator 2): The game for which this mod is developed.
Therefore, a “P310 Sabãozinho ETS2” mod is a highly detailed and customized representation of the iconic, lowered, and often GBN-styled Scania P310 truck, designed for use in Euro Truck Simulator 2.

What to expect from such a mod:
Replication of the Real “Sabãozinho”: The mod aims to capture the essence of the famous real-world truck, including its unique stance, accessories, and often its specific paint job.
Extensive Customization:
Chassis Options: Often includes 4×2 (Toco), 6×2 (Truck/Bitruck), and sometimes 8×2 configurations, often with adjustable suspension height (air ride features).
Interiors: Detailed cabins with custom dashboards, seat textures, and Brazilian-style accessories (curtains, fans, GPS, etc.).
External Parts: A vast array of options for bumpers (chrome, painted, various designs), grilles, mirrors, exhaust pipes, side skirts, mudflaps (often with GBN logos), sun shields, and a comprehensive lighting package (LEDs, various auxiliary lights).
Wheels and Tires: Often includes custom “Alcoa” style wheels and “arqueadas” (arched) tire options.
Realistic Sounds: Custom engine sounds (often with the characteristic “diretão” or loud exhaust sound popular in Brazil), air brake sounds, and internal cabin sounds.
High Quality: Mods replicating famous Brazilian trucks like the “Sabãozinho” are usually created by skilled modders who put a lot of effort into detail and optimization.

Credits: SEBOZO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
